1247290.name: GameGuru MAX
1247290.description:
GameGuruMAX: Empowering Game Creation

GameGuruMAX is an intuitive 3D game development platform designed to accelerate the creation of immersive games—no programming experience required. Whether you're a newcomer to game development or a seasoned creator, GameGuruMAX offers a streamlined workflow and powerful toolset, including model importing and full LUA scripting for advanced customization.

Key Features

Streamlined Interface

Work efficiently within a clean, responsive interface designed to support rapid development. Built-in tutorials and time-saving shortcuts help you stay productive from day one.

Advanced Level Editor

Construct expansive game worlds with a robust 3D editor featuring terrain sculpting, dynamic object and character placement, weather systems, particle effects, and more.

Tree and Vegetation Rendering

Populate your game world with lush vegetation using tools that allow for both automatic and manual placement of trees and grasses, enhancing environmental realism.

Extensive Asset Library

Accelerate your workflow with over 1,400 ready-to-use assets, including characters, buildings, props, and foliage.

Character Creator & AI Behaviours

Design custom characters and assign predefined AI behaviours to populate your world with interactive, reactive NPCs.

Visual Logic System

Create core game mechanics using a visual scripting interface, ideal for building gameplay systems without writing code.

Full LUA Scripting Support

GameGuruMAX includes hundreds of customizable behaviours and supports LUA scripting for users who want to expand functionality and tailor game systems to their exact vision.

Storyboard Editor

Manage your game’s flow and structure visually with the Storyboard Editor, great for handling level progression, cut scenes, and branching storylines.

Modern Graphics Features

Deliver high-fidelity visuals with real-time lighting, PBR (Physically Based Rendering), ambient occlusion, and a suite of post-processing effects.

Physics Integration

Utilize the built-in Bullet Physics Engine to incorporate realistic collisions, gravity, and movement, thereby enhancing immersion and gameplay dynamics.

Export & Distribution

Compile your project into a standalone executable ready for sharing or commercial release, no extra licensing fees required.

Modular HUD System

Design custom heads-up displays (HUDs) using a variety of templates and assets, allowing for personalized game interfaces that suit your project's aesthetic.

Let Your Game Making Journey Begin

GameGuruMAX is designed to support the rapid development of a wide range of genres, from first-person shooters, and RPGs to puzzle games and narrative adventures. Included demo levels and templates help you learn the workflow and kickstart your projects with confidence.
